common_0270_head_teacher_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Thank you for coming, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_02:
Have you been enjoying your time here at
Naranja Academy?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_02b:
Have you been enjoying your time here at
Uva Academy?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_03: That is most wonderful to hear.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_04:
I see... Do remember I am always here to lend an
ear should you find yourself struggling in any way.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_05:
Now, you may be wondering why we could not
have simply conversed earlier in the cafeteria.\c
But let me assure you, there is a reason why I
asked you to meet me here in my office.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_06:
It seems that a friend of mine has a rather serious
matter they would like to discuss with you.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_07:
Ah, no, I’m afraid they aren’t actually here
in this room with us. One moment, please.\r
Just allow me to connect us...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_hakase_01a:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. It is nice to
meet you.[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0270_hakase_01b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. It is nice to
meet you.[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0270_hakase_02a:
My name is Professor Sada. I carry out Pokémon
research within the Great Crater of Paldea—\r
at a site known as [VAR COLOR(0006)]Area Zero[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_02b:
My name is Professor Turo. I carry out Pokémon
research within the Great Crater of Paldea—\r
at a site known as [VAR COLOR(0006)]Area Zero[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_head_teacher_08:
The professor is, in fact, a graduate of our fine
academy, as well as a splendid researcher.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_hakase_03a: Well. Allow me to get straight to the point.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_03b: Well. Allow me to get straight to the point.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_04a:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)], student ID number
805C393...\c
You are the student who travels with the unusual
Pokémon [VAR PKNAME(0001)], is that correct?[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_04b:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)], student ID number
805C393...\c
You are the student who travels with the unusual
Pokémon [VAR PKNAME(0001)], is that correct?[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_05a:
Thank you. I appreciate that you were honest in
confirming the facts.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_05b:
Thank you. I appreciate that you were honest in
confirming the facts.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_06a:
Why would you attempt to lie? You appear in
any number of clips from security camera footage\r
together with [VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_06b:
Why would you attempt to lie? You appear in
any number of clips from security camera footage\r
together with [VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_07a:
Ah, not that I— I do not mean to offend you.
In fact, I wish to ask for your assistance.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_07b:
Ah, not that I— I do not mean to offend you.
In fact, I wish to ask for your assistance.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_08a:
Oh. How good to see that you are well. It has
been quite a while since we last met.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_08b:
Oh. How good to see that you are well. It has
been quite a while since we last met.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_09a: Koraidon was once in my care, you see.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_09b: Miraidon was once in my care, you see.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_19a:
Its Poké Ball was also originally mine. I assume
you received it from a young man called Arven.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_19b:
Its Poké Ball was also originally mine. I assume
you received it from a young man called Arven.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_10a:
I am no longer in any position to be able to
manage that Pokémon myself.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_10b:
I am no longer in any position to be able to
manage that Pokémon myself.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_11a:
This is what I would ask of you: Will you continue
looking after Koraidon on my behalf?[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_11b:
This is what I would ask of you: Will you continue
looking after Miraidon on my behalf?[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_13a:
And yet, it is clear to see from the way Koraidon
reacts to you that you must be a kind Trainer.\r
Your bond seems quite undeniable.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_13b:
And yet, it is clear to see from the way Miraidon
reacts to you that you must be a kind Trainer.\r
Your bond seems quite undeniable.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_14a:
Koraidon has been greatly weakened and is
currently incapable of battle.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_14b:
Miraidon has been greatly weakened and is
currently incapable of battle.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_15a:
It can, however, take on a form specialized for
mobility.\c
In all likelihood, it will require some time to
fully regain the capabilities it once had.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_15b:
It can, however, take on a form specialized for
mobility.\c
In all likelihood, it will require some time to
fully regain the capabilities it once had.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_16a:
I will provide you with my contact information.
If you would please get out your phone?[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_16b:
I will provide you with my contact information.
If you would please get out your phone?[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_hakase_17a:
I will be in regular contact going forward to keep
tabs on your status.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_0270_hakase_17b:
I will be in regular contact going forward to keep
tabs on your status.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_0270_head_teacher_09:
Could this Pokémon have its origins within
Area Zero...?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_10a: Sada... Don’t tell me you actually did it...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_10b: Turo... Don’t tell me you actually did it...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_10:
Well, it seems that the professor is asking quite
the favor of you.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_11:
But of course the academy is always here to
support you in any way that we are able.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_12:
I do hope you’ll continue to enjoy your school
life, together with that [VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0270_head_teacher_13:
Area Zero, hm... What are you doing down there,
Professor...?[VAR 0114(000A)]
